Cox Model with Likelihood Based Boosting Survival Learner

Source: R/LearnerSurvCoxboost.R
LearnerSurvCoxboost.Rd

Calls CoxBoost::CoxBoost.

  • lp is predicted by CoxBoost::predict.CoxBoost

  • distr is predicted by CoxBoost::predict.CoxBoost

  • crank is identical to lp

Use LearnerSurvCoxboost and LearnerSurvCVCoxboost for Cox boosting without and with internal cross-validation of boosting step number, respectively. Tuning using the internal optimizer in LearnerSurvCVCoxboost may be more efficient when tuning stepno only. However, for tuning multiple hyperparameters, mlr3tuning and LearnerSurvCoxboost will likely give better results.

Dictionary

This Learner can be instantiated via the dictionary mlr_learners or with the associated sugar function lrn():

LearnerSurvCoxboost$new()
mlr_learners$get("surv.coxboost")
lrn("surv.coxboost")

Meta Information

  • Type: "surv"

  • Predict Types: distr, crank, lp

  • Feature Types: integer, numeric, factor, logical

  • Properties: weights

  • Packages: CoxBoost Matrix distr6 survival

References

Binder H, Allignol A, Schumacher M, Beyersmann J (2009). “Boosting for high-dimensional time-to-event data with competing risks.” Bioinformatics, 25, 890--896.

See also

Other survival learners: LearnerSurvBlackboost, LearnerSurvCVCoxboost, LearnerSurvCVGlmnet, LearnerSurvCoxPH, LearnerSurvFlexible, LearnerSurvGBM, LearnerSurvGamboost, LearnerSurvGlmboost, LearnerSurvGlmnet, LearnerSurvKaplan, LearnerSurvMboost, LearnerSurvNelson, LearnerSurvObliqueRSF, LearnerSurvParametric, LearnerSurvPenalized, LearnerSurvRandomForestSRC, LearnerSurvRanger, LearnerSurvRpart, LearnerSurvSVM
